channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Key Lifecycle Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Key Lifecycle Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-25686|2024-08-02T11:25:19.427Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 247601.

item.title: CVE-2023-25689|2024-08-02T11:25:19.427Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1 , and 4.1.1 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 247618.

item.title: CVE-2023-25688|2024-08-02T11:25:19.340Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 247606.

item.title: CVE-2023-25687|2024-08-02T11:25:19.430Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from log files. IBM X-Force ID: 247602.

item.title: CVE-2023-25684|2024-08-02T11:25:19.288Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 247597.

item.title: CVE-2023-25923|2024-08-02T11:32:12.662Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1 could allow an attacker to upload files that could be used in a denial of service attack due to incorrect authorization. IBM X-Force ID: 247629.

item.title: CVE-2023-25924|2024-08-02T11:32:12.755Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1 could allow an authenticated user to perform actions that they should not have access to due to improper authorization. IBM X-Force ID: 247630.
